mcq.statement: Which chemicals used in air conditioners, refrigerators, freezers, and packing foam manufacturing are responsible for ozone layer depletion?
mcq.one_liner: Chlorofluorocarbons, commonly known as CFCs, are chemicals used in appliances and foam manufacturing that are responsible for the depletion of the **ozone layer**.
